newsitem.title: USA: Alumax increases upcharge on some billet.
newsitem.headline: Alumax increases upcharge on some billet.

text.p: Alumax Inc's Alumax Primary Aluminum Corp on Friday said it increased its upcharge on certain sizes of billet, a form of primary aluminum.
The increases, which went into effect immediately, reflect market conditions, the company said.
The upcharge -- an additional charge on top of base prices -- for six-inch diameter billet (all alloys) was increased by $0.02 a pound.
The upcharge on billet in lengths of 20 inches or less, regardless of diameter, was increased by $0.01 a pound.
The increases apply to an existing upcharge of $0.09 a pound, added to the current spot-market price for 6063 billet.
